26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_MATRIX2X2_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_MATRIX2X2_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include <cassert>
31 #include <reactphysics3d/mathematics/Vector2.h>
32 
34 namespace reactphysics3d {
35 
36 // Class Matrix2x2
40 class Matrix2x2 {
41 
42  private :
43 
44  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
45 
47  Vector2 mRows[2];
48 
49  public :
50 
51  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
52 
54  Matrix2x2();
55 
57  Matrix2x2(decimal value);
58 
60  Matrix2x2(decimal a1, decimal a2, decimal b1, decimal b2);
61 
63  void setAllValues(decimal a1, decimal a2, decimal b1, decimal b2);
64 
66  void setToZero();
67 
69  Vector2 getColumn(int i) const;
70 
72  Vector2 getRow(int i) const;
73 
75  Matrix2x2 getTranspose() const;
76 
78  decimal getDeterminant() const;
79 
81  decimal getTrace() const;
82 
84  Matrix2x2 getInverse() const;
85 
87  Matrix2x2 getInverse(decimal determinant) const;
88 
90  Matrix2x2 getAbsoluteMatrix() const;
91 
93  void setToIdentity();
94 
96  static Matrix2x2 identity();
97 
99  static Matrix2x2 zero();
100 
102  friend Matrix2x2 operator+(const Matrix2x2& matrix1, const Matrix2x2& matrix2);
103 
105  friend Matrix2x2 operator-(const Matrix2x2& matrix1, const Matrix2x2& matrix2);
106 
108  friend Matrix2x2 operator-(const Matrix2x2& matrix);
109 
111  friend Matrix2x2 operator*(decimal nb, const Matrix2x2& matrix);
112 
114  friend Matrix2x2 operator*(const Matrix2x2& matrix, decimal nb);
115 
117  friend Matrix2x2 operator*(const Matrix2x2& matrix1, const Matrix2x2& matrix2);
118 
120  friend Vector2 operator*(const Matrix2x2& matrix, const Vector2& vector);
121 
123  bool operator==(const Matrix2x2& matrix) const;
124 
126  bool operator!= (const Matrix2x2& matrix) const;
127 
129  Matrix2x2& operator+=(const Matrix2x2& matrix);
130 
132  Matrix2x2& operator-=(const Matrix2x2& matrix);
133 
135  Matrix2x2& operator*=(decimal nb);
136 
138  const Vector2& operator[](int row) const;
139 
141  Vector2& operator[](int row);
142 
144  std::string to_string() const;
145 };
146 
147 // Constructor of the class Matrix2x2
148 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2::Matrix2x2() {
149 
150  // Initialize all values in the matrix to zero
151  setAllValues(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
152 }
153 
154 // Constructor
155 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2::Matrix2x2(decimal value) {
156  setAllValues(value, value, value, value);
157 }
158 
159 // Constructor with arguments
160 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2::Matrix2x2(decimal a1, decimal a2, decimal b1, decimal b2) {
161 
162  // Initialize the matrix with the values
163  setAllValues(a1, a2, b1, b2);
164 }
165 
166 // Method to set all the values in the matrix
167 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Matrix2x2::setAllValues(decimal a1, decimal a2,
168  decimal b1, decimal b2) {
169  mRows[0][0] = a1; mRows[0][1] = a2;
170  mRows[1][0] = b1; mRows[1][1] = b2;
171 }
172 
173 // Set the matrix to zero
174 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Matrix2x2::setToZero() {
175  mRows[0].setToZero();
176  mRows[1].setToZero();
177 }
178 
179 // Return a column
180 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector2 Matrix2x2::getColumn(int i) const {
181  assert(i>= 0 && i<2);
182  return Vector2(mRows[0][i], mRows[1][i]);
183 }
184 
185 // Return a row
186 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector2 Matrix2x2::getRow(int i) const {
187  assert(i>= 0 && i<2);
188  return mRows[i];
189 }
190 
191 // Return the transpose matrix
192 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 Matrix2x2::getTranspose() const {
193 
194  // Return the transpose matrix
195  return Matrix2x2(mRows[0][0], mRows[1][0],
196  mRows[0][1], mRows[1][1]);
197 }
198 
199 // Return the determinant of the matrix
200 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Matrix2x2::getDeterminant() const {
201 
202  // Compute and return the determinant of the matrix
203  return mRows[0][0] * mRows[1][1] - mRows[1][0] * mRows[0][1];
204 }
205 
206 // Return the trace of the matrix
207 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Matrix2x2::getTrace() const {
208 
209  // Compute and return the trace
210  return (mRows[0][0] + mRows[1][1]);
211 }
212 
213 // Set the matrix to the identity matrix
214 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Matrix2x2::setToIdentity() {
215  mRows[0][0] = 1.0; mRows[0][1] = 0.0;
216  mRows[1][0] = 0.0; mRows[1][1] = 1.0;
217 }
218 
219 // Return the 2x2 identity matrix
220 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 Matrix2x2::identity() {
221 
222  // Return the isdentity matrix
223  return Matrix2x2(1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
224 }
225 
226 // Return the 2x2 zero matrix
227 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 Matrix2x2::zero() {
228  return Matrix2x2(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
229 }
230 
231 // Return the inverse matrix
232 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 Matrix2x2::getInverse() const {
233 
234  return getInverse(getDeterminant());
235 }
236 
237 // Return the matrix with absolute values
238 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 Matrix2x2::getAbsoluteMatrix() const {
239  return Matrix2x2(std::abs(mRows[0][0]), std::abs(mRows[0][1]),
240  std::abs(mRows[1][0]), std::abs(mRows[1][1]));
241 }
242 
243 // Overloaded operator for addition
244 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 operator+(const Matrix2x2& matrix1, const Matrix2x2& matrix2) {
245  return Matrix2x2(matrix1.mRows[0][0] + matrix2.mRows[0][0],
246  matrix1.mRows[0][1] + matrix2.mRows[0][1],
247  matrix1.mRows[1][0] + matrix2.mRows[1][0],
248  matrix1.mRows[1][1] + matrix2.mRows[1][1]);
249 }
250 
251 // Overloaded operator for substraction
252 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 operator-(const Matrix2x2& matrix1, const Matrix2x2& matrix2) {
253  return Matrix2x2(matrix1.mRows[0][0] - matrix2.mRows[0][0],
254  matrix1.mRows[0][1] - matrix2.mRows[0][1],
255  matrix1.mRows[1][0] - matrix2.mRows[1][0],
256  matrix1.mRows[1][1] - matrix2.mRows[1][1]);
257 }
258 
259 // Overloaded operator for the negative of the matrix
260 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 operator-(const Matrix2x2& matrix) {
261  return Matrix2x2(-matrix.mRows[0][0], -matrix.mRows[0][1],
262  -matrix.mRows[1][0], -matrix.mRows[1][1]);
263 }
264 
265 // Overloaded operator for multiplication with a number
266 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 operator*(decimal nb, const Matrix2x2& matrix) {
267  return Matrix2x2(matrix.mRows[0][0] * nb, matrix.mRows[0][1] * nb,
268  matrix.mRows[1][0] * nb, matrix.mRows[1][1] * nb);
269 }
270 
271 // Overloaded operator for multiplication with a matrix
272 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 operator*(const Matrix2x2& matrix, decimal nb) {
273  return nb * matrix;
274 }
275 
276 // Overloaded operator for matrix multiplication
277 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2 operator*(const Matrix2x2& matrix1, const Matrix2x2& matrix2) {
278  return Matrix2x2(matrix1.mRows[0][0] * matrix2.mRows[0][0] + matrix1.mRows[0][1] *
279  matrix2.mRows[1][0],
280  matrix1.mRows[0][0] * matrix2.mRows[0][1] + matrix1.mRows[0][1] *
281  matrix2.mRows[1][1],
282  matrix1.mRows[1][0] * matrix2.mRows[0][0] + matrix1.mRows[1][1] *
283  matrix2.mRows[1][0],
284  matrix1.mRows[1][0] * matrix2.mRows[0][1] + matrix1.mRows[1][1] *
285  matrix2.mRows[1][1]);
286 }
287 
288 // Overloaded operator for multiplication with a vector
289 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector2 operator*(const Matrix2x2& matrix, const Vector2& vector) {
290  return Vector2(matrix.mRows[0][0]*vector.x + matrix.mRows[0][1]*vector.y,
291  matrix.mRows[1][0]*vector.x + matrix.mRows[1][1]*vector.y);
292 }
293 
294 // Overloaded operator for equality condition
295 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Matrix2x2::operator==(const Matrix2x2& matrix) const {
296  return (mRows[0][0] == matrix.mRows[0][0] && mRows[0][1] == matrix.mRows[0][1] &&
297  mRows[1][0] == matrix.mRows[1][0] && mRows[1][1] == matrix.mRows[1][1]);
298 }
299 
300 // Overloaded operator for the is different condition
301 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Matrix2x2::operator!= (const Matrix2x2& matrix) const {
302  return !(*this == matrix);
303 }
304 
305 // Overloaded operator for addition with assignment
306 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2& Matrix2x2::operator+=(const Matrix2x2& matrix) {
307  mRows[0][0] += matrix.mRows[0][0]; mRows[0][1] += matrix.mRows[0][1];
308  mRows[1][0] += matrix.mRows[1][0]; mRows[1][1] += matrix.mRows[1][1];
309  return *this;
310 }
311 
312 // Overloaded operator for substraction with assignment
313 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2& Matrix2x2::operator-=(const Matrix2x2& matrix) {
314  mRows[0][0] -= matrix.mRows[0][0]; mRows[0][1] -= matrix.mRows[0][1];
315  mRows[1][0] -= matrix.mRows[1][0]; mRows[1][1] -= matrix.mRows[1][1];
316  return *this;
317 }
318 
319 // Overloaded operator for multiplication with a number with assignment
320 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2& Matrix2x2::operator*=(decimal nb) {
321  mRows[0][0] *= nb; mRows[0][1] *= nb;
322  mRows[1][0] *= nb; mRows[1][1] *= nb;
323  return *this;
324 }
325 
326 // Overloaded operator to return a row of the matrix.
329 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector2& Matrix2x2::operator[](int row) const {
330  return mRows[row];
331 }
332 
333 // Overloaded operator to return a row of the matrix.
336 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector2& Matrix2x2::operator[](int row) {
337  return mRows[row];
338 }
339 
340 // Get the string representation
341 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE std::string Matrix2x2::to_string() const {
342  return "Matrix2x2(" + std::to_string(mRows[0][0]) + "," + std::to_string(mRows[0][1]) + "," +
343  std::to_string(mRows[1][0]) + "," + std::to_string(mRows[1][1]) + ")";
344 }
345 
346 }
347 
348 #endif
